citations.narrative:
8 ducks were in an enclosure that did not include water for bathing or other aquatic activities. Aquatic birds require access
to water to perform natural behaviors, and may become debilitated and stressed without the ability to perform those
behaviors. The facility must ensure that water adequate to meet the needs to perform natural behaviors is provided in the
primary enclosure.
Correct by 28 November 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(c) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
8 ducks were in an enclosure that did not include water for bathing or other aquatic activities. Aquatic birds require access 
to water to perform natural behaviors, and may become debilitated and stressed without the ability to perform those 
behaviors. The facility must ensure that water adequate to meet the needs to perform natural behaviors is provided in the 
primary enclosure. 
 
Correct by 28 November 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
